text: Kha Nganpa (also known as Kha Nganba) is one of the seven main clans (called Yek Salai) of the Meitei people. The Kha Nganpa are part of the old Meitei group of clans. The Seven Yeks of Manipur. e-pao.net == Number of families == Meitei sub-groups Romanisation Number of families/surnames (according to N.
